title: Inflation rate in Zimbabwe 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.

The line significantly increased by 14.15 from Year 1984 to 1985,remained stable by 11.73 from Year 1987 to 1988,increased by 2.79 from Year 1988 to 1989,increased by 11.79 from Year 1990 to 1991,remained stable by 10.14 from Year 1991 to 1992,remained stable by 2.62 from Year 1992 to 1993,increased by 2.38 from Year 1993 to 1994, and lastly, increased by 12.47 from Year 1994 to 1995.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 1984 and 1985.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 16.01 was reached at Year 1985
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 0.38 was reported at Year 1993
min_summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
mid_summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1984 and 1985.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 16.01 was reached at Year 1985
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 0.38 was reported at Year 1993
max_summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1984 and 1985.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 16.01 was reached at Year 1985
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 0.38 was reported at Year 1993

The line drastically increased by 8.6 times from Year 1984 to 1985,remained stable by 12.1 times from Year 1987 to 1988,increased by 3.6 times from Year 1988 to 1989,increased by 9.7 times from Year 1990 to 1991,remained stable by 4.4 times from Year 1991 to 1992,remained stable by 7.9 times from Year 1992 to 1993,increased by 7.3 times from Year 1993 to 1994, and lastly, increased by 5.5 times from Year 1994 to 1995.
